specialAbilities.Hold Breath: While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 30 minutes.
specialAbilities.Underwater Camouflage: The octopus has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while underwater.
specialAbilities.Water Breathing: The octopus can breathe only underwater.

Tentacles.onHit: (1d1) bludgeoning damage. The target is grappled (escape DC 10) Until this grapple ends, the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target

Ink Cloud.desc: (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest) A 5-foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.
